alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Laramie Range; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 1:49PM MST until March 05 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...North Laramie Range...northern Carbon County...northern Laramie County and eastern foothills of the south Laramie Range. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor visibility from blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Laramie Range; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range Foothills
